name: Bridging Skills Gap
description:
Bridging Academia Industry Skills Gap

As millions of young people graduate each year armed with a degree and explore opportunities to begin their careers in the corporate world, most of them often lack practical knowledge and workplace skills. The Bridging Academic Industry Skills Gap Game is developed to provide young people with all the necessary knowledge to confidently start their careers. The learning content is byte sized and developed in the game format which young people are very familiar with. 

Credits:

Project Idea & Owner : Ayub Omar

Learning Content :  Ayub Omar & ChatGPT

Developer : Matteo 

Generative AI Developer : A. Shohih
